opis2: Chinese Medicine is my passion, life philosophy, and work. Acupuncture is the main tool of my work. I have been running my practice in Wroc≈Çaw for over 15 years. I help women who suffer from disorders of their menstrual cycle. I support infertile couples in rebuilding their bodies and preparing for conception. I take care of the health and immunity of pregnant women and young children. I conduct acupuncture courses for therapists and workshops in Chinese medicine for my patients.
